comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~jay-lau-513

comments.content:
Since this doesn't appear to be failing for any other patches, and this is failing on a patch that changes availability zone filters, I'm assuming it's a side effect of the patch itself and not a random failure.

https://review.openstack.org/#/c/65198/
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~mriedem

comments.content:
I do see that this was hit in n-cpu:

http://logs.openstack.org/98/65198/2/check/check-tempest-dsvm-postgres-full/5b803ac/logs/screen-n-cpu.txt.gz?level=TRACE#_2014-01-07_03_57_55_453

So maybe you hit bug 1255624, doesn't look like there is an elastic-recheck query for that yet.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~mriedem
